DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to look at the safety (what are the side effects) and efficacy (how well does it work) of Magnevist (the study drug) used for MRI of the calf and foot arteries. The results will be compared to the results of MRI taken without Magnevist, and with the results of your X-ray angiography.
DOC.brief_title: MagnevistÂ® Injection Enhanced MRA Compared to Non Contrast MRA for the Detection of Stenosis in the Calf and/or Pedal Arteries
DOC.detailed_description: This study has previously been posted by Berlex, Inc. Berlex, Inc. has been renamed to Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.is the sponsor of the trial.
DOC.criteria: Has known or suspected disease of the calf and/or pedal arteries Is scheduled for Xray angiography Has any contraindication to magnetic resonance imaging Is scheduled for any procedure before the Xray angiography Had previously had stents placed bilaterally in the calf and/or foot arteries
DOC.keyword: Stenosis of the calf and/or pedal arteries
